data.eml:eml: Stephanosporamayana (Stephanosporaceae, Russulales), a new sequestrate fungus from Yucatan Peninsula, Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fuente, Javier Isaac de la, Guevara-Guerrero, Gonzalo, ros-Ortega, Ivan, Romeo Sanchez-Zavalegui,, ordova-Lara, Ivan, arcia-Jimenez, Jesus (2019): Stephanosporamayana (Stephanosporaceae, Russulales), a new sequestrate fungus from Yucatan Peninsula, Mexico. MycoKeys 48: 115-124, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.48.31007, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.48.31007
